FindLines<T>(Board<T>, T, Int32, List<Pos>)

Finds all horizontal, vertical, and diagonal lines consisted of values equal to the specified value, inside a board.

Declaration
public static bool FindLines<T>(this Board<T> board, T value, int length, List<Pos> result = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Board<T> board

The board to find lines in.
T value

The value to find lines of.
System.Int32 length

The required minimum length. Lines exceeding this length will only be counted once.
List<Pos> result

The list where the positions of found lines will be stored, if provided.
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

Whether any lines were found.
Type Parameters
Name Description
T
Remarks

To be used in games such as Tic-Tac-Toe and Connect 4.
